IRS990EZ.PrimaryExemptPurposeTxt: BREA OLINDA TEACHERS ASSOCIATION (BOTA) IS A MEMBERSHIP GROUP OF SCHOOL EMPLOYEES WITH THE PRIMARY PURPOSE OF PROTECTING AND ADVANCING THE PROFESSIONAL AND ECONOMIC INTEREST OF ITS MEMBERS.

ProgramSrvcAccomplishmentGrp.DescriptionProgramSrvcAccomTxt: REPRESENT THE MEMBERSHIP IN CONTRACT NEGOTIATIONS WITH THE SCHOOL DISTRICT.
